question: Which nation's national football team is known as "The Indomitable Lions"?
explanation: Cameroon's National Football Team is informally known as The Indomitable Lions. It is the first African team to reach the quarter-final of the FIFA World Cup in 1990. This team has qualified seven times for the FIFA World Cup. No other African teams have achieved this feat. It also won Gold in 2000 Summer Olympics Football tournament.
